• New area: Belobog - History and Culture Museum
• New companion missions for Silver Wolf, Luocha, Yanqing and Bailu
• New main event: Starhunt Game
• …and more!

name: The AMC Squad
description: The AMC Squad is an epic story-driven FPS running on the Build Engine. It combines gameplay mechanics of retro-shooters with aspects of modern titles, complete with a story-driven narrative that spans over several episodes.

name: Il Destino
description: The third game released by Gotmail, this time in collaboration with the used car website Goo-net. The player must escape a car shop.

name: Tamagotchi Uni
description: The Tamagotchi Uni is a virtual pet released by Bandai Toys on July 15, 2023. It is designed as a successor to the Tamagotchi Smart and the Tamagotchi Pix, and it is the first color-screen Tamagotchi device to have a simultaneous global release.

name: Tenebris Pictura
description: Exploration, ghost hunting and puzzles in the Victorian era.

name: Base Ganymede: Complete
description: A 3 episode vanilla megawad for Doom 1 containing a total of 27 maps. Set on one of Jupiter's moons called Ganymede, this wad should provide a challenge for a wide variety of skill levels ranging from the humble newbie to veteran speedrunner. Each episode has it's own progression rather than the usual base -> hellbase -> hell.

name: Khorus
description: Khorus is a 9-level wad, in which you should battle against evil in woods and deserts, caves and vaults, the ancient abandoned temples and catacombs of the forgotten civilisation (that has some related roots with the ancient Egypt's one), and all it - while listening to Russian folk music, or later motives close to them (with a possible small exception). You will learn, why nobody likes cyberdemon's voice, also you will take part in the search of our hero's missing red cow, and feel the Mastermind's wrath, who couldn't expect that despite numerous and difficult traps, prepared for you, nevertheless, you'll break into his den to make the court of Doom come true.

name: Wasteland of East
description: A Chinese style wasteland pixel style role-playing game. The combat mode is turn based combat chess. Can collect resources to manufacture weapons and props. Play the role of an expatriate comrade performing a mission on the abandoned soil of Huaxia.

name: Idle Worlds
description: An idle game with unique gameplay features. Travel between 8 different worlds and upgrade local generators to increase your profit. Use unique upgrades system to boost your stats or discover even more interesting prestige system to maximize your profit.

name: Orz
description: You are at point 0. Therefore, you need to go to point 1.

name: Date Z
description: "Date Z" - a captivating mix of high school drama, romance, and mystery. As a transfer student, your challenge is to navigate relationships and secure a date by Friday to survive a deadly virus outbreak. Unravel the hidden secrets. Every choice you make counts.

name: Generation Zero: Companion Accessories Pack
description: Pack offers three strategic modules: Medic, Scavenger, and Spotter. Also, advanced armor such as Ballistic Plates, Concussive Plates, and Fire Retardant Insulation. Plus, enjoy 11 cosmetic options for your Companion.

name: Krzyżacy: The Knights of the Cross - Character Pack (Western Style)
description: Krzyżacy - The Knights of the Cross：Character Pack (Western Style) can replace the portraits and avatars of each character image in the game with one click

name: Santa's Letters VR
description: Santa's Letters is a spatial puzzle game in which you have to find matching pieces among a lot of other interesting things. Put them together to make a toy!

name: Hannah & Henry
description: Presto! Magic becomes real for big hearted latchkey kid Hannah, a witch-in-training under the tutelage of her pet cat, as she learns that genuine witchcraft is not the kind of hocus pocus that she's seen on TV!

name: Hidden Kingdom: Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Dream Seed
description:
Dream Seed is a Madoka Magica Yume Nikki fangame for the Yume Nikki Dream Diary Jam 7. No knowledge of either series is needed to enjoy this game.

Explore the world from Homura's room and discover your purpose.

name: For Elise
description:
There's something I wanted to make for that one person.
I wanted to make something for Elise...

A Yume Nikki fangame developed for the Dream Diary Jam 7.

name: Oddy's Lost and Found
description:
Do you remember why Oddy hired you?
Explore the unknown world, seek oddjects that await to be found.

A Dream Diary Jam 7 entry.

name: Pa-nap
description: A little Yume Nikki-inspired fan game made in 7 days for the Dream Diary Jam 7.

name: Signature
description:
You play as a doodle and explore a strange world inside a sketchbook.

Made for Dream Diary Jam 7

name: Dream Chaser
description:
"When the moon rises in the sky, dreams awaken"

Daria is a teenager who is suddenly involved in dream hunting, unusual people who are dedicated to finding and eliminating nightmares that threaten people's lives. That trade is a family tradition that is imposed by her mother, and for this reason she would not like to leave it even knowing how exhausted she is deep down. Today, like another day, she is preparing to chase another nightmare.

Get into the hunt for dreams in mini-game battles, no more just watching characters do things; dodge and attack using your own ability It's all based on your strategy and skill!

Manage a system of moods that affect the course of the battle. Don't be surprised if a character flinches or gets angry if he sees one of his allies fall in combat!

Explore a world inspired by concepts and characters from Yume Nikki and other fangames. Solve the mysterious past of other characters and hunt down the nightmares that engulf the entire world.

name: Azumi and the Vertical Slice
description: Azumi and the Vertical Slice is a proof of concept for a 2D action platformer that attempts to bring modern indie speed and catharsis to the classic days of the Sega Mega Drive and Blast Processing. Fight through a wave of enemies and escape the room you're trapped in!

name: The Dark Pictures Anthology: Intercession
description: Intercession is the second installment of the second season of The Dark Pictures Anthology series, and the sixth installment overall.

name: The Dark Pictures Anthology: Winterfold
description: Winterfold is the third installment of the second season of The Dark Pictures Anthology series, and the seventh installment overall.

name: The Dark Pictures Anthology: The Craven Man
description: The Craven Man is the fourth installment of the second season of The Dark Pictures Anthology series, and the eighth installment overall

name: Rising Sun Mahjong
description: Mahjong on the background of the rising sun! Soft and delicate morning colors, the city and the countryside in a bluish haze, glistening dew drops on the leaves of trees..... All this and fascinating levels-puzzles in the mahjong genre are waiting for you in this game!

name: Rhythm Hell
description: Help a poor seal out by clapping back the rhythms shown! Clapping on cue makes the meter go up, missing cues makes the meter go down! Aim for the highest score as the difficulty slowly progresses!

name: Cities: Skylines - 90s Pop Radio
description: 90’s lovers out there, this Radio Station is for you! With “90’s Pop” you'll fall in love with this incredible music once again: enjoy 16 new tracks and almost one hour of music.

name: Martin The Let's Player
description: Hey! My name is Martin and I want to become popular on YouTube. Would you help me?

name: Cities: Skylines - Piano Tunes Radio
description: “Piano Tunes” is the perfect Radio Station for those of you who love classical, whimsical, elegant piano music. With 16 songs and approximately one hour of music, your city will rise flawlessly from your fingertips!

name: Shitataru Nikki
description:
Shitataru Nikki is an exploration of the thoughts and mind of the most deplorable and sickening human being possible. You play as Keko, a criminal hiding from the law, as he holes himself up in a dingy hotel room and waits for the heat to die down.

It was developed for the 2023 Dream Diary Jam

name: Everlong Swansong
description:
Everlong Swansong is an English Yume Nikki fangame made for Dream Diary Jam 7. You play as Ana and explore her dreams.

What will you discover?

name: Neonsomnia
description: Neonsomnia is a game about exploring a strange and surreal dream world. It was developed for the Dream Diary Jam 7 and is a fangame based on Yume Nikki.

name: Missing Memories
description:
Traverse through the memories as Naomi, a girl who refuses to leave her house due to some unfortunate events regarding a relative.

The game was made for the Dream Diary Jam 7.

name: Flushed Regrets
description:
Explore a surreal world full of toilets, bathrooms and excrement!

Will you ever understand?...

What happened is in front of you, can you understand what you are being shown and realise the true ending of this game?

name: Swan Song
description: Swan Song is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 7 by scummbag.

name: Lepidoptera
description: A butterfly identification and social adventure game. Identify butterflies in South Dakota and Autralia.

name: Robodash
description: Prepare for an adrenaline-fueled journey in Robodash, a brutally challenging 3D platformer. Each fall means starting over as you navigate unforgiving obstacles, dodge treacherous traps, and conquer daunting gaps. Get ready for a rage-inducing platforming experience.

name: May Angels Fall Down
description: Follow under, to a secretive cult of Icarus filled with lost individuals who seek selfish salvation. At its center lies Haejin, an alluring yet tormented leader whose flesh, when consumed, cures mortality.

name: Ash of Gods: Fan Edition

name: Friends vs. Friends: Baba's Laundromat
description: Stop by Baba's Laundromat, home to stray pigeons, stinky clothes, and most importantly, the first free content expansion for Friends vs Friends

name: Supreme Summoner
description: "Supreme Summoner" is a fair online turn-based strategy card game set in the Three Kingdoms era, allowing players to construct their own decks based on various card skills for free battles.

name: Invincible: Guarding the Globe
description: Invincible: Guarding the Globe is a mobile squad idle RPG with an original Invincible storyline.

name: Caxy Gambá Encontra o Monstruário
description: Caxy Gambá Encontra o Monstruário is a point-and-click adventure game that tells the story of Caxy Gambá, a marsupial who, during a stormy night, takes shelter in a mansion in the middle of nowhere. It was produced by 44 Bico Largo, idealized by Ale McHaddo, and had the special participation of José Mojica Marins, playing his trash horror film character Coffin Joe.

name: Bengbo
description: A crazy roguelike shooter where being on a roll and rolling dice is synonymous. Upgrade yourself and battle mechanical adversities in a corrupt casino set in a future Sweden!

name: AutoForge
description: In AutoForge you will build an expansive automated factory reaching up to the sky and deep into the ground, unlock and explore regions of a vast world filled with wonder and danger, upgrade yourself with ancient technologies, and then defend it all from the unfriendly denizens of the world.

name: Nihongo School
description: Let's have fun learning Japanese words with matching games!

name: Trap Attack
description: TRAP ATTACK is a fast-paced arcade game. Use your teleporter to move around the levels and try to avoid the traps. Traps will increase in number and in difficulty over time. Test your reflexes, survive as long as you can. How long can YOU last?

name: Surviving Hunter
description: Welcome to the thrilling adventure of Surviving Hunter, where you will embark on a perilous journey to save your homeland from the clutches of ancient rulers.

name: Recordance
description: Recordance is a sci-fi themed first person shooter game. Utilize experimental weapon systems and vehicles to defeat an unknow enemy across multiple environments. Unlock new weapon systems and customise your droid and vehicles as you battle towards victory!

name: Hidden SciFi City Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Po-Go-No!
description: Po-Go-No! is a colorful and psychedelic arcade game where, on a pogo stick, you have to bounce between different floor tiles - each with different effects on your run and score points!

name: Hiirun
description: Witch's cat turned her master into a mouse! Aim for the highscore by chasing the cat, surviving, collecting cheese and jumping on bouncy flowers! Jump over the mouse traps and watch out for the bouncy flowers that turn into ouchy ouchy flowers when hit by magic.

name: Omizu no Hanamichi
description: A PlayStation video game based on a Japanese TV drama of the same name.

name: NBA 2K6
description: Xbox 360 port of NBA 2K6.

name: Storia Stories
description: Included in the Story Me app.

name: Circle Triangle Square
description: Puzzle game using three types of objects to solve problems

name: The Crisis Zone
description: The Crisis Zone is a sci-fi exploration game with elements of horror in a dramatic atmosphere. Explore this open world and find information about how you got here and how you can escape from this quarantine zone. Avoid the monsters and security drones patrolling the territory

name: NBA 2K7
description: Old gen port of NBA 2K7.

description: Included in the Story Me app.

name: NBA 2K8
description: PlayStation 2 port of NBA 2K8.

name: NBA 2K9
description: PlayStation 2 port of NBA 2K9.

description: Included in the Story Me app.

name: Magical Kiss
description: Included in the Story Me app.

name: Rainy Days In Casablanca
description: Rainy Days In Casablanca is a limit-removing Doom II project from various members of Doomer Boards, led by joe-ilya. Welcome to the winter of 1900's Casablanca; the land of big casinos, dark alleys and singing skeletons.

description: Luminous Gloom is a short episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards. This month's project lead is 40oz.

name: Christmas In Inferno
description: Christmas In Inferno is a festive episode for Doom 2 made to be played on any limit-removing port of your choice brought to you by Sant-ilya Claus and his merry band of helpers from the north pole the Doomer Boards. Play as Santa and go to hell and back to deliver presents. Get it before Christmas is over!

name: Vrack Botanicals
description: Vrack Botanicals is a ten-map Doom 2 episode for limit-removing ports brought to you by various members of the Doomer Boards, themed around Vrack-style bases, overgrown vegetation, and space marijuana. This month's project lead was 40oz.

description: Dreamcatcher Apparatus is a short megawad for Doom 2. It is designed for limit removing source ports and made by various members of Doomer Boards led by 40oz.

name: Moto Vlog Brasil
description: Moto Vlog Brasil is a first-person open-world simulator focused on motorcycles, it has 30 motorcycles to do all sorts of things, run away from the police if you bypass the speed limit, walk freely around the city doing delivery jobs around the city to earn money and buy new motorcycles.

name: Mausoleum Nefarium
description: Mausoleum Nefarium is a episode of respectable size for Doom 2. It is designed for limit removing source ports and made by various members of Doomer Boards led by 40oz.

name: Emerald City
description: Emerald City is a 15 map episode for Doom II designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards. These maps illustrate the decay of a metropolis conquested by the plant and animal kingdoms after the fall of Man...

name: Jolly Junkyard

name: Augustland Barrens

name: Zeppelin Armada
description:
Zeppelin Armada is a new steampunk-themed megawad for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards, lead by 40oz.

There's two versions here for download - a "full" version with Steampunk weapons, skins & sounds and a "clean" version with just the maps and the classic Doom weapons.

description: Monuments of mars is a short episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards.

description: Coffin Curse is a short episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards.

name: Vicarious Reality
description: Vicarious Reality is a short episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards. It was inspired by an abandoned retro-themed project by MagicMaha.

name: Dungeons and Demons
description: Dungeons and Demons is an 8-map limit-removing episode for Doom II from various members of Doomer Boards. In the words of adventuresmith @xvertigox, this month's project lead, Dungeons and Demons "is an one shot DND campaign played one slow Sunday afternoon on a dingy UAC base. Can you find the Daikantana Staff and make it out with your life? Will you try to take on the BBEG too early and end up having to re-roll your character? Grab your die and lets find out."

name: Occult Secrets of the Third Reich on Mars
description: Occult Secrets of the Third Reich on Mars is the 21st limit-removing project from the inglorious bastards themselves: the Doomer Boards Krew. Featuring nine maps of outrageous soon-to-be-banned-in-Germany action, not to mention possibly the most sector swastikas ever assembled in a single WAD file, OSotTRoM is a timely reminder that the only good Nazi demon is a dead Nazi demon. On Mars.

name: Biotech is Godzilla
description:
Forests of concrete and steel, breathing and flowing forever under the wide eye of the sun, now ruled the works of man. His own eyes watch as hummingbirds swarm their branches and feed from whirring flowers. Long since had a creature like him been to this place, and standing in the midst of this weird marriage of nature and machine, he felt himself an intruder. What happened here, to create this new earth? And what became of those responsible for this ironclad garden of earthly delights?

Before he can finish the thought, the marine's spell is broken by a thundering roar.

Seems not all of man's gifts were of good intention...

Biotech is Godzilla is the 22nd limit-removing project from the nature-loving, tree-hugging hippies in the Doomer Boards Kommune. Led by glenzinho, it features eight maps of intense scenic action pretty enough to paint a picture that will have you itching to get out your gardening overalls after it's all said and done.

name: Evil Egypt
description: Evil Egypt is a limit-removing Doom 2 episode from various members of Doomer Boards. This time, DBP goes back to basics with project lead 40oz taking you to a rather familiar locale. Just don't mind the new paint job.

name: Spaceballs: The Sequel: The Search For More DBP Maps
description: Spaceballs: The Sequel: The Search For More DBP Maps is a Doom II limit-removing project from the world famous doomerboardskrew, masterminded by director vertigo aka @xvertigox. Grab your popcorn and helmets and play it soon!

name: Dead But Dreaming
description: Dead But Dreaming is your descent into madness, disguised as a 12-level limit-removing episode for Doom 2 summoned by @dmdr and the occult folks of Doomer Boards.

name: Cirque Eclipse: The Scarlet Curtain
description: Included in the Story Me app.

name: The City of Damned Children
description: Loosely inspired by a cult French film, project lead @Big Ol Billy takes us into a crudely photo-digitized alternate Doom universe, standing on the sturdy shoulders of @Doomkid's "bootleg" Doom64-in-vanilla resources. This Doom 2 limit-removing set features 11 regular maps, plus an additional progression-stopping credit map. You'll also get new monsters, a chance to brush up on your French, and more MIDI accordion than you even knew you were ready for!

name: 10 Day Vacation
description: 10 Day Vacation is a Doom 2 limit-removing episode from various members of Doomer Boards. In this installment, project lead Joe-Ilya has finally found the perfect solution for summertime fun during a raging pandemic: playing Doom at home, of course!

name: Fear and Loathing
description:
Welcome to Mars, Marine. Due to a plague of photosensitivity caused by cheap gas station cheese and retinal parasites, we've had to enforce a strict low-light policy for the sake of our staff. That won't be a problem, right? You shouldn't expect to see much action up here anyway...

Fear and Loathing is a limit-removing Doom 2 mapset from various members of Doomer Boards. Conductor Scrangus McBrickdad (aka @Jaxxoon R), the lead behind the tranquil Lillywhite Lilith, brings the exact opposite with a spooky combination of ambient sounds, darkness*, vicious monsters and perhaps most horrifying of all: Doom 3. There's also some extra eye candy for GZDoom users, which is perfect for the Halloween season.

name: Morbid Autumn
description: Morbid Autumn is a Doom 2 limit removing episode made by various members of Doomer Boards. This month's project lead is 40oz.

name: The Magnificent Five
description:
This time around the story goes that while you were out hunting game in the prairie an old nemesis of yours "Black Hand Burt" murdered your wife & daughter, and robbed you of your fortune. Now you're on a path of Revenge! Your goal is to kill Burt & all of his men for what they did.

The Magnificent FIVE is a limit-removing Doom 2 mapset lead by your favorite space shark & containing contributions from FIVE members of Doomer Boards, containing FIVE maps, with only FIVE weapons to choose from.

name: Santa's Outback Bender
description:
It’s almost Christmas Eve, but no one’s seen Santa since he left to go party with demons in Australia! Those dudes are such bad influences... hell, they've practically got the whole country on lockdown. You hate being a buzzkill, but if someone doesn't find Santa and sober the old bastard up, no one's getting any prezzies!

Santa's Outback Bender is a Doom 2 limit-removing project from various members of Doomer Boards, led by resident down under Doomer glenzinho. It's the 3rd annual Doomer Boards Project Christmas extravaganza, and this year instead of the traditional cooler climes of the northern Winter, we're heading south to enjoy a Summer Christmas Down Under style. That means there's no snow and plenty of sun, surf, sand, and slaying!

name: Sugary Garden
description: Included in the Story Me app.

name: The Merry Christmassy Doom Project
description: The Merry Christmassy Doom Project is a short limit removing episode for Doom 2 designed by various members of Doomer Boards with a Christmas theme. Massive props to @Jaxxoon R and @Big Ol Billy for salvaging this project and saving DBP Christmas in the process! Happy holidays Doomers!

name: Mindblood Genesis
description: Are you ready? Are you enough of a badass to blast through the relentless slaughter of pure carnage and come back just in time for dinner?! On this quest, more than just your mind will be blown away when you enter the realm of Mindblood Genesis.

name: Legend of the Hidden Tech
description:
The hottest meso-american-sci-fi game show in the ultraverse just got a new contestant! But this ain't no Price is Right. If you want to win the big prizes, you'll have to fight your way through ancient ruins, mysterious tombs, not-so-tranquil lakes, and demonic arenas. Don't worry, though. Whether you live or die, it's all for a good cause: entertainment!

Legend of the Hidden Tech is a 9-map episode for limit-removing ports made by members of Doomer Boards. The set features 7 regular maps, 1 monsterless progression-stopper, and a very special bonus map from @SuperCupcakeTactics. Props to overlord @Big Ol Billy for leading this!

name: Earth Ends
description: Earth Ends is a 6-map episode for limit-removing ports made by members of Doomer Boards. Thanks joe-ilya for being the lead on this one!

name: Lilywhite Lilith
description:
Tangled vines wind through crumbling limestone, serving as still markers under a misty sky. The stark tranquility belies something fell and horrible... for how long have you clutched the cold grip of your rifle? Lead forward by your own bloodlust and fervor; that lilywhite lilith.

Lilywhite Lilith is a 10-map episode for limit-removing ports made by members of Doomer Boards. The set features 9 regular maps, and 1 monsterless progression-stopper. @Jaxxoon R is the overlord to bow to :)

name: Into The Storm
description: Why not cool the Sigil heat with a little gothic thunderstorm? Into The Storm is a limit-removing episode made by various members of Doomer Boards. Project lead @SuperCupcakeTactics promises it'll leave you black and blue... in a good way!

name: After the Fall
description:
After society's fall hell's children reign over our lands, but their kind only knows chaos and disharmony. Servants of evil turn on their evil brethren tearing them limb from limb and place their spoils on display, while others sacrifice their own flesh to bring suffering and destruction. Pregnant bellies ripe of demonseed threaten to overwhelm resistance, but the tide is turning, and it's time to rise again and reclaim the cities, forests and mountains.

After the Fall is a limit-removing episode made by various members of Doomer Boards, featuring 7 maps of explosive Doom action and monsterless credit maps. This month's project is a sequel to Fall of Society, both led by Glenzinho.

name: Strip in Love
description: Included in the Story Me app.

name: Fuck Global Warming... This is Hell
description: Fuck Global Warming... This is Hell is a limit removing episode by various members of Doomer Boards, led by Joe-Ilya. It features eight maps of earth on hell and the introduction of a couple new and so-old-they-are-new members. Welcome (back) marines!

name: Cyb's Freaky Colonoscopy
description: Cyb's Freaky Colonoscopy is a limit-removing medical documentary of the various doctors and nurses from Doomer Boards, led by Big Ol' Billy. With 11 levels of carnage, it's the biggest, baddest and grossest DBP adventure yet! Shoutout to the two members making their DBP debut: Hardcore_gamer and dmdr!

name: Alone
description: Alone is a 9 map limit removing episode for Doom 2 by various members of Doomer Boards. Shout out to @xvertigox for his first DBP as project lead, and @gaspe and @Jaws In Space for their DBP debuts!

name: Umbral Platinum
description: Umbral Platinum is a limit-removing project brought to you by us the Doomer Boards dungeon masters.

name: A Doomer Boards Christmas Carol
description:
It's that time of year again. Snow is falling, carolers are caroling... and Cyberneezer Scrooge has frozen time to stop Santa from delivering everyone's Christmas presents!

Sounds like a job for Doomguy, right? Well, to be honest, you're just not feeling the Christmas spirit this year. Although... hmmm... you still haven't looked at the Christmas cards those Doomer Boards Krew folks sent you yet! Maybe that'll be just the thing to help you feel some Christmas cheer...

A Doomer Boards Christmas Carol is a limit-removing Doom 2 mapset from various members of Doomer Boards, containing 12 maps of jolly action and a heartwarming 13-map narative from @Big Ol Billy. Merry Christmas Doomers!

name: Holmes from Homes
description: Included in the Story Me app.

name: Snake Farm
description: A top-down action roguelike about buying snakes, fighting them, selling their oil, and buying more snakes. Upgrade your weapons, get stronger snakes to fight, and chase down a high score with only ten days to live.

name: Unhappy Cinderella
description: Included in the Story Me app.

name: Maji de Daiya Runba
description: Sin descripción

name: Story Me: Interactive Novel
description:
”Story Me” is a interactive novel app that changes the story depending on your choices.
You can enjoy episodes in many genres such as dramas, romance and adventure stories.

name: Nazo-Oh
description: Nazo-Oh is an Adventure game, developed by Bandai Visual and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 1996.

name: Paint Match
description:
Color blending puzzle game.
Match target colors by blending paint droplets and enhance your understanding of color theory along the way.
In each level, you are presented with a specific target color and a set of color droplets to mix. Your objective is to recreate the target color as precisely as possible using the provided droplets. Your goal is to replicate the target color as accurately as possible using the available droplets. As you advance, the difficulty escalates, progressively building your intuition and knowledge of color theory.

name: Rekuiemu Nikki
description:
Find me, otherwise you will lose yourself.

Rekuiemu Nikki is a Yume Nikki fangame, about exploring mind of young Julie, who locked herself at home due to adverse circumstances.

It took quite a long time, and Julie even forgot about the incident, but in one of her many dreams she discovered a strange creature. Now she is forced to find out the truth, but what it will lead to depends on the player.

name: Openlid
description: A interpretation of Yume Nikki in 3D, developed for the Dream Diary Jam 7.

name: The Curious Case of Captain Cray
description:
After the disastrous wreckage of his ship Captain Cray finds himself and his crew upon a curious island of dreams, where his crewmates are found in deep slumber. There, he realizes he can miraculously enter their dreams by resting himself...

Will Captain Cray be able to rescue his crew? Or will they forever be succumbed to their nightmares?

name: Down the Eye of the Tiger
description: A burnt out Las Vegas cocktail waitress has grown to resent her life, her city, and her choices. In the wake of an incident at her job, she decides to dedicate some more time to "self care" (sleeping, adopting avoidant behaviors, ditching work), and finds her dreams blending with those of the magician's white tiger at the casino where she works.

name: Aquarium
description: Yume Nikki fangame featuring a stone statue named Paint. An entry for Dream Diary Jam 7.

name: Pokémon Supernova Sun
description: Pokémon Supernova Sun and Penumbra Moon are mods for Pokémon Ultra Sun and Ultra Moon. Like my Rutile Ruby & Star Sapphire hacks and my Nova Sun & Umbra Moon hacks, their main purpose is to provide a more challenging game experience while not artificially limiting the player. The premier feature of Supernova Sun and Penumbra Moon is the ground-up redesign of Pokémon Trainers in the world to increase the game’s challenge. Every trainer in the game has been edited, and the level curve expects use of the Experience Share, which means that the player levels up very quickly. Every Pokémon in Trainers’ teams has a a proper moveset and many are holding items. The Elite Four and Champion are Level 100, and the player doesn’t need to grind to equal that!

name: Portal: Prelude RTX
description:
In partnership with NVIDIA and powered by RTX Remix, Portal: Prelude RTX is a remaster of the 2008 ModDB Mod of the Year Top 3 Winner, Portal: Prelude, with stunning full ray tracing and high-fidelity assets, the groundbreaking AI-accelerated performance of DLSS 3, and the lowest texture load times with RTX IO. Step into the boots of Abby, the newest testing associate in Aperture Science, as you solve nineteen mind-bending chambers putting your Portal skills to the ultimate test. Make use of momentum, perform narrow escapes through deadly particle fields, and learn to work with manipulated gravity while heartless but dedicated observers watch and berate your every move.

When you finally come face to face with the minds behind Aperture Science, witness the scientific hubris marking the downfall of the facility as the activation of GlaDOS sets the scene for the rest of the Portal series to follow.

name: Nightsong
description:
In Nightsong you play Linda Nightsong, a level 0 bard, with great fishing skills, and some magical knowledge. When a series of mysterious attacks strikes a riverside village, Linda and her friend Uzoma come to the rescue, and must save all the villagers before dark! To fend off the bewitched creatures, you must use the power of your magic tambourine to put the creatures to sleep and continue your quest.

This is a 30-minutes platform where you need to save all villagers before the time up. With several routes, you must carefully explore Anhuma village, using safe routes, avoiding traps, and avoiding creatures as much as possible, putting them to sleep.

name: Krampen
description: Krampen is a horror-adventure game in which you will immerse yourself in a winter forest and help a lost soul regain a piece of itself. Uncover all the secrets that go beyond the gaming experience and discover the truth about the main character!

name: Heist Force
description: Single-player 3rd-person action heist game. Infiltrate banks, outmaneuver enemies, execute high-stakes heists. Engage in intense shootouts, utilize diverse weapons, navigate dynamic environments. Can you become the ultimate Heist Force?

name: Mansion Mystery
description: Dive into 'Mansion Mystery,' an immersive VR puzzler. In a haunted mansion governed by real-world physics, ignite matches, shatter plates, solve intricate puzzles. Will you unravel the secrets and escape or be trapped forever?

name: Pack My Stuff: New City
description: Immerse yourself in the vibrant life of the big city in PACK MY STUFF: NEW CITY! Here you will become a master of packing packages and experience breathtaking adventures.

name: Specters of the Sun
description: Specters of the Sun is a challenging 2D action platformer with action-packed levels. Take on the role of an elusive specter to reclaim your old corpse, now possessed at the heights of your former kingdom.

name: Nonorelia
description: A logic puzzle game and sci-fi visual novel rolled into one. Solve nonograms to overcome obstacles as Noah Von Sterne struggles to save his colony and reunite his family, or unwind and sharpen your mind with our relaxing Picture, Random, and ASMR Modes.

name: Up the Hill Down to the Nevermind
description: Up the Hill Down to the Nevermind is a game about identity, girlhood, delusion, and memory. A lonely and depressed hikikomori grapples with their existence and transgender identity in a world where delusion begins to intertwine with reality. What once was good is now lost and all there is left is memory. But how reliable is your memory?

name: Capybara Quest
description: A simple platformer about a Capybara who goes on a quest to rescue their baby.

name: Iron Man
description: Sin descripción

name: Iron Man
description: Sin descripción

name: Iron Man
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Stylist Fashion Makeover
description: There's a new fashion super stylist in town! In this fashion makeover story game make sure your makeup and fashion styling is on point. Be seen! Go to fancy events, win every fashion battle and take pics for the Stylegram. Show off your fashion styling,dress up and make up skills in this makeover story game.

name: Iron Man 2
description: The PSP version of Iron Man 2 is a port of the Wii version.

name: Iron Man 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Harem
description: An unreleased erotic game for the Atari 2600.

name: Monke Adventure
description: Monke Adventure is a platformer game made by turtledev69, it is set in a jungle where you need to escape

name: Tinker Island 2
description:
Tinker Island 2 is back – bigger and better than before! Join a crew of survivors on an island split between two factions – the villagers and the citizens that are fighting for island domination!
Based on the original Tinker Island award-winning mobile game, Tinker Island 2 throws you into another adventure on a deserted island, filled with mysteries, riddles, epic battles and questions that boggle even the brightest of the minds!
Discover the mystery of the island inhabited by three factions – the villagers, the citizens and the aliens. Pick a side, help them out with quests and discover the secrets of Tinker Island 2. Discover strange locations, battle creatures from the depths of your ultimate nightmares and help out the mysterious characters achieve their destiny!
Enjoy the rich story adventure game that leads you from the beach across the entire island to the grand finale in the volcano. Decide if you are going to help the villagers or join forces with the citizens in defeating the evil aliens that want the island for themselves!

name: Platform Panic
description: Platform Panic is an endless platform game where the goal is to navigate through the levels while avoiding enemies and spikes. The game is inspired by platform games from the fourth generation of video game consoles.

name: Smarter Than You
description: Smarter Than You is an asynchronous duel not unlike an iterated game of "Rock-Paper-Scissors". However, the outcome of these choices vary, and players have the opportunity to try and influence the opponents choice.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate - Daemonhunters: Execution Force
description:
Unleash the Emperor’s judgement as a new threat casts a shadow over the galaxy. Execution Force introduces the elite Officio Assassinorum, a secretive, deadly force capable of eliminating high-value targets with surgical precision. Utilise their unparalleled stealth and lethal arsenal to turn the tide of battle as you face a new danger in the form of the Tentarus Hive.

Alongside this, take the fight to the forces of Nurgle as you unleash your strike force into the heart of enemy cruisers in brand-new Boarding Action missions, disabling them and claiming the spoils of victory.

name: NXT Takeover
description: Sin descripción

name: Project: Shiba
description:
As the world's first half-human hybrid, you know that you're not something that's supposed to exist. Yet, here you are. An outcast in a world that's not your own.
Stuck in a feud between yourself and your encroaching distorted view of the world.
To you, things have always been black and white.
You've accepted your worth on this planet, and have accepted whatever torment the next day may bring.
You've accepted that you belong in captivity, locked away from the world, and have always been nothing more than some science project.
However, one day, in a spur-of-the-moment impulse...
..your entire life will change.

name: Entrenched
description: Entrenched is a Mulitplayer FPS World War 1 inspired arena shooter where you play in many warzones.

name: Impulse
description: A game of carball.

name: Gyakuten Higurashi Saiban: Curry Naru Gyakuten
description: A fan game of Higurashi with Ace Attorney gameplay.

name: Ember: Reignition
description: Ember: ReIgnition is a local multiplayer competitive fighting game in which you and your friends play as a lost knight and his spectral adversary, engaging in combat to determine the final survivor.

name: Prostitute Simulator 2
description: Welcome to the second entry of the best prostitute simulator. In this game you will be able to satisfy your hottest desires. Work as a prostitute, get clients and enjoy amazing anime and realistic porn scenes with stylized 3D models.

name: Lovely Links
description: This is a classic puzzle game where players clear the game area by eliminating blocks with matching patterns. Within the given time, players need to find connectable blocks to unlock beautiful CG images. Challenge your observation and reflex skills, and enjoy the fun of elimination!

name: San Xing Dui
description: This is a click , Roguelike game inspired by China's Sanxingdui culture. Players can use the left mouse button to attack and the right mouse button to upgrade to unlock the entire Sanxingdui;

name: Valiant
description: Valiant is a first person shooter game.

name: Star Conflict: Edges of risk - Stage two: Deluxe edition
description: This pack includesAccess to additional rewards in the event “Edges of risk. Stage two”.Upon receipt, the following 15 levels are immediately unlocked and all rewards of the unlocked levels are available30 days of premium license.The ability to unlock three additional levels in the next Battle pass “Ancient instinct”

name: Star Conflict: Edges of risk - Stage two
description: This pack includesAccess to additional rewards in the event “Edges of risk. Stage two”.Upon receipt, the next level is immediately unlocked and all rewards of the unlocked levels are available7 days of premium license.

name: Odyssey Moon
description: Discover Odyssey Moon, the charming ARCADE game filled with shooting, upgrades, and adorable characters. Explore the moon in space, enhance your character with unique combinations, and immerse yourself in this cute adventure. Get ready to fall in love!

name: Metal Storm X
description: Get ready for an adrenaline-pumping adventure in "Metal Storm X," a visually captivating 2D side-scrolling shooter!

name: Tri-Tri-Triobelisk
description:
Tri-Tri-Triobelisk is a fast paced strategy game that is designed for being played by two people on the same iPad (computer opponents are also included). Maneuver shots with your fingers to destroy the other player's five triangular crafts while defending your own. Made for intense duels of frantic firing, tactics, guile and agility.
Contains an original soundtrack by electronic musician Triobelisk.

name: RPS Knights
description:
Large-scale wars under the 'Rock-paper-scissors' rules you know.
A unit who lose a game or draw in a game will drop out.
Only winners can stay in a queue and challenge again.
Enjoy unbelievably huge Rock-paper-scissors wars!

name: Xcalibur 2
description: XCALIBUR 2 is an exciting and fast paced speed runner.

name: Space Lazors: Puzzle Saga
description:
Space Lasers - puzzle with lasers and mirrors. In game there are more than 300 levels that can help you forget about your problems and spend time with pleasure. Use your mind, wit and creative potential to solve difficult puzzles quickly.
The game is divided into several worlds that have from 20 to 30 levels of different complexity and block characteristics (some of them reflect the laser, others reflect and pass it through themselves or teleport to other places etc).

name: PixelTerra
description: The world of PixelTerra is quite dangerous so you need to build a shelter, find some food supply and get ready to protect yourself from monsters in order to survive at least a couple of days. Then you can only hope that the walls of your shelter will be strong enough to withstand the onslaught.

name: Raceway
description: Animal go-carting at its finest! Grab your friends, pick your favourite cute animal racer, and go for gold!

name: Bottle Empire
description:
Bottle Empire is a board game where the goal is to create an empire of breweries and casinos. The game takes place in the 1920s during the prohibition era in America.
The mafia organization is your enemy and you have to withstand their attempts to prevent you from becoming the Kingpin of Bottles.

name: Mechers
description: Checkers with Mech Robots.

name: Snackroach
description: Assist your distant cousin, Snackroach, on a perilous mission! Guide the courageous little critter towards the coveted food gate while minimizing your taps. Navigate past foes, hurdles, and treacherous rockfalls!

name: Hero Beetle War: Tower Attack
description:
In the world of shadow ninjas, role-playing a skilled ninja fighting against hordes of devil ninjas to save your girlfriend.
Your beloved has been kidnapped, and the only way to get her back is to parkour through a massive tower filled with enemies at every level. But don't worry coz you have some powerful skills up your sleeve. You can use your shadow power and beetle jitsu to brawl against the devil ninjas, even the strongest boss in multiple epic fights.
As you fight through thousands of battles, you will become as strong as a superman. With each level, you will need to choose which enemy to fight first to build up your strength and become the strongest avenger of them all.
But the path to victory is not easy. You will face many challenges on your journey, and only the most skilled and cunning ninjas will succeed. Do you have what it takes to save your girlfriend and become the ultimate avenger? The fate of your love and the world rests in your hands.
So, gear up with your ninja weapons and get ready for an epic adventure in Hero Beetle War.

name: Random Merge Defense
description: Simple, Addictive The "Random Merge Defense"

name: My Talking Cat Lily
description: Your virtual pet is here! Play with talking cat Lily - purrfect virtual cat. What’s furry, playful and waiting to get your attention? It’s your new virtual pet! Start the adventure together with your talking cat Lily. Care for your virtual cat and make her the happiest feline ever! Love your talking pet like you’ve never loved any pet before! Download and play My Talking Cat Lily.

name: Rodney's Funscreen 2 Extreme
description: Rodney's Funscreen 2 Extreme: Dinky's Revenge is a semi-sequel / upgrade to Rodney's Funscreen that was released in Japan by Interlink for the PC and Mac platforms in 1997.

name: Undead Wilderness
description: Undead Wilderness: Survive the unforgiving jungle, unravel its mysteries, and escape the relentless horde of bloodthirsty zombies. Scavenge, manage resources, and fight for your life in a heart-pounding race against the growing undead threat.

name: Droidscape: Basilica
description: Droidscape: Basilica is a unique puzzle-arcade game set in the grim electropunk future. A power-hungry Ecclesiarchy has plunged humanity into a new Dark Ages. The last remaining Chronomancer has been taken hostage on the gargantuan Basilica space station, and if he dies, an already dark world will get a lot darker. Only a small, unarmed droid named Bishop 7 can save him-and only with your help.

name: Lucha Underground
description: Sin descripción

name: Midnight Scenes: A Safe Place
description: Phil's life has crumbled to dust. The four walls of his room have become his safe haven. He yearns for sleep... but terrible nightmares haunt him. Welcome to a new dimension of horror. Welcome to Midnight Scenes.

name: Mue
description:
A Horror game where you play Alicia, wandering through a creepy mansion filled with human-like statues... Who did this, and why ?

Face your fears in Mue.

name: Magnetism Rally
description:
Rei's going on a date. In your experience, this tends to be pretty disastrous, so you need to do your best job as her dog to prevent her from screwing up too badly.

Made by Sev and Kiki for the GMTK 2023 Game Jam, 'Roles Reversed'.

name: 3 Heures D'Agonie
description: 3 heures d'agonie (English: 3 Hours of Agony) is a 32-level megawad for limit-removing source ports, created by members of the French Doom community. Each map in the WAD was made within a three hour time limit, though the concept differs from traditional speedmapping events in that there was no singular mapping period, allowing participants to create multiple levels. Additionally, several maps exceeded the time limit, with one map taking as long as nine hours to build.

name: The Given
description:
The Given is a single-level PWAD for Doom II, created in 2017 by Darryl Steffen (dobu gabu maru). It was named as the inaugural winner of the Machaward at the 2017 Cacowards, and was one of three maps that earned Steffen the title of "Mapper of the Year," the others being Saturnine Chapel and Devil's Den. It uses the music track, "The Village that Time Forgot," composed by Tristan Clark.

The map requires a limit-removing source port with an increased SEGS limit to play, such as PrBoom+ or GZDoom. Due to the map consisting of one gigantic area with a high level of detail, players may suffer performance issues. A second WAD file (TheGivenLD) is included, and is an alternate version with reduced detail so as to improve performance.

With an emphasis on atmosphere and exploration, the map contains no monsters or hazards; instead the player must navigate a series of puzzles scattered across the map in order to access an island at the map's centre. Inside the WAD is a plain text lump named PROLOGUE. It contains over 2500 words of lore that provides the context for the WAD.

name: 8-Bit RPG Creator
description: 8-Bit RPG Creator is a game developed and published by Five Nights at Freddy's creator Scott Cawthon. With this game, you can create your own Role Playing Games.

name: Yeah! You Want "Those Games", Right? So Here You Go! Now, Let's See You Clear Them!
description: Cute and comical stickman characters have arrived for you to enjoy "those games" you've seen and wanted to play before. Play a variety of minigames fully, thoroughly, and enjoyably to your heart's content!

name: All-In-One Summer Sports VR
description: 9 Summer Sports in Just 1 Game! Embark on the ultimate summer adventure. Experience the thrill of various sports on our breathtaking tropical island. More than a game, it's your personal summer paradise, your ticket to a sports-filled, sun-soaked virtual vacation.

name: 9 R.I.P.: Special Edition
description:
"This city has long been a land of many being spirited away, and those who are mentally ill or heavily distressed are more likely to be taken. Are you alright?”

Protagonist Misa Isshiki is a second-year high school student. It was around the beginning of fall when her best friend said this to her, which gave her a shock.

“I don’t believe in being spirited away, so I’m alright.”

That’s right, she doesn’t believe in it. She just… feels lost because of a major distress—her career path.

She hears a creepy voice whisper in her ears.

“Let us find your path. I am the one who will tempt you into the darkness.”

From that point on, strange things begin to occur around her…

name: Gunslinger Girl Volume II
description: Sin descripción

name: Future Weapon 2D
description: Future Weapon 2D is a top down space shooter where you can relive the couch co-op glory days with up to 8 players across 2 screens. Grab a gun, grab a spaceship, upgrade everything, mine rocks, explore, and recruit the local townsfolk to conquer this demo.

name: Empires & Allies
description: Empires & Allies portrays a military cartoon world composed mostly of archipelagos with each player beginning with one island, and being able to expand to up to four other islands. Each archipelago represents an "empire" or militarized island nation, with a "world alliance" that the player can optionally enter, but by doing so forfeits an ability to attack other sovereign nations. The player's task is to recover their island nation's glory and defeat the main villain, "The Raven," and his commanders, who each have covered a separate archipelago that the player must island hop until the end of the "chain" which is the island that "The Raven" resides on.

name: Ant General
description: Ant General is a turn-based strategy game where you control an army of ants.

name: Viking Hiking
description: Viking Hiking is a cheerful 3D Platformer. Join Bøf on his adventure to reach Valhalla. Jump, dash and use the horn as you explore a lush but challenging island! Viking Hiking is a FREE game made by second year students from Breda University.

name: Newer Mario Kart Wii
description: A new mario kart wii mod which expands on the original and adds more! Features include 200cc, custom items and MORE! Giving the game a Newer coat of paint!!!

name: Mémoire 0079
description: Mémoire 0079 is a narrative adventure game about exploring a wiki-like interface to uncover the secret history of a mecha war between earth and space in the uncomfortably not-so-distant future.

name: You Are The Road
description: A truly unique game in which your goal is to create “on the fly” the racing track on which cars will race… you can even see the driver’s emotions when they approach various curves and slopes. Don’t make your road too hard to drive, or you will make all cars crash and burn!

name: Il Destino R
description: The fourth game released by Gotmail, a more difficult version of Il Destino. It features multiple language options and different puzzles. The player must escape a car shop.

name: Surrealidade: Dadaist Remix
description: Surrealidade: Dadaist Remix is an update for Surrealidade: Definitive Edition, which adds brand-new content after 20 years, with a Dadaist New Game+ that unlocks an unprecedented game mode created after 20 years, a retro mini-game, a short film, new extra content, and a huge amount of content made available as additional material.

name: The Fall of Porcupine: Last Days of Summer
description: New jobs can be tense – especially when you’re about to become a doctor! Join Finley on an original narrative adventure as you take your first steps in a fresh and exciting world. Together, experience the “Last Days of Summer” before a change of seasons stirs up the sleepy town of Porcupine.

name: Doki Doki Pink Eyes
description: in Pink Eyes, we are again at the club, but this time we bring Natsuki to life in this fun and warm love story.

name: The 10x10 Project
description: The 10x10 Project is a modest set of ten BOOM-compatible maps made as mapping exercises in which I restricted myself to using ten stock textures and ten stock FLATs in each (with some universal textures such as switches, doors, DOORTRAK, lights, etc.). Pistol starts are intended but I won't put a gun to your head. Starts out at Plutonia difficulty then starts worshipping Killer5 and Insane Gazebo later on (but still easier than their stuff). In addition there is a secret map that will probably be unpopular.

name: Axiom
description: semi-dark underground map

name: Sepia
description:
Sepia is a 34-map megawad (which started as a NaNoWadMo project) with maps ranging from lighter brown shade to darker brown shade. The mapset is mainly targeting DSDA-Doom (Woof should also handle it, but it wasn't tested), but GZDoom should work for the most part as well (use it at your own risk still, there might be more issues than i found).

The mapset is divided into 4 episodes with themes variying from the trench warfare of the WW1 to abstract solid-colored places in the void. Difficulty varies as well, with the wad starting fairly tame, but getting progressively harder both in movement department (episode 3 being heavy on the plaftoming side) and in combat department (episode 4 being heavy on the slaughter side).

name: Pathogen
description: Thanks Nue for the speedy work on the graphics, textures were pinched from CC4 and Jimmys Zoon texture packs (also where the misty sky came from). New palette is ReaperAAs excellent Coldpal colour palette.

name: Miasma
description: One fairly large and complex map. Difficulty should be more on the challenging side, harder encounters are mostly optional though.

name: Machete
description: MACHETE is a 32 level Boom compatible megawad made during NaNoWadMo 2022.

name: Hydrosphere
description: It contains 6 very short maps that follow a theme inside a Hydroelectric plant. Gameplay is fairly easy and mostly consists of a power trip style.

name: Gravity
description: Two levels for any limit removing port. PrBoom-Plus with gamma 1 or GZDoom are recommended.

name: Goetia 1
description:
Goetia (Medieval Latin; anglicised as goety) is a practice that includes the conjuration of demons

Doomguy, in an effort to take out more demons, engages in arcane demon rituals to reach the demon's realm.

name: Fallen Leaves
description: This wad features 7 small to medium sized maps with mainly an autumn theme, with the last two maps being snow themed. This wad utilizes, and was largely inspired by, DiR's beautiful Opal Palette.

name: Emerald Ambush
description: Emerald Ambush is a single, small map for Doom II. It has been tested in PrBoom+, GZDoom, and Doom Retro. Set in an overgrown facility, this map was made mainly to get me back in the habit of mapping after a fairly lengthy break. It is similar in style to my Sucker Punch mapsets, but the green detailing is not intended to imply an easy difficulty (it shouldn't be too rough, though).

name: Dubai
description: tech-base with a varied theming, mid-sized, generally nonlinear, less puzzle-like

name: Candlemass
description: 1 medium-sized map for Boom-compatible source ports with a monochrome theme, with a second map to stop the player from progressing into the stock maps.

name: Bloodstain
description:
Bloodstain is a full 32-map megawad for Doom2 made by Pavel Tvrzník, Czech Doom mapper known in the Doom community as Pipicz.

Bloodstain's map format is limit-removing Doom2. Recommend playing
with complevel 2, although it can certainly be played on other comp-
levels too.

name: Bloodspeed
description: This project started on Doom Power as a compilation of maps from speedmapping and gradually turned into something more. Some maps were seriously reworked, others were created from scratch and went a long way of development, or were transferred from other projects. The overall style of the project is very heterogeneous, and is a mixture of highly detailed and lengthy work, adjacent to the short and minimalist, practically unchanged speed mapping. The maps are divided into three thematic episodes describing the beginning of the invasion on earth, the journey into the realm of demons, and return to the our world that is already covered with ice.

name: Devil's Grip
description: Sin descripción

name: Mutabor
description: One large and complex vanilla compatible map. Difficulty-wise this should be a bit less demanding than some of my previous works. Map 2 and 3 are just bonus stuff

name: Sucker Punch
description: Sucker Punch features 9 small single-player maps for Doom II, tested in PrBoom+, ZDoom, GZDoom and Doom Retro. The WAD is made up from three mini-episodes of three maps each which escalate from easy (with green details) to harder (yellow) to hardest (red). The maps should take no longer than two or three minutes each to play and are designed for pistol starts. Difficulty settings are implemented.

name: Attack on IO
description:
Attack on IO is a 7 map wad with themes of tech bases, castles and bloody unholy landscapes. It has you stationed on the moon of IO and has you being dragged through hell and back.

This wad features custom textures by Ukiro (Otex) and music by Jason "Jay" Reichard and Jimmy Paddock.

All levels have been designed with pistol start in mind, although you can also play continuously.

name: The Rebirth
description: Total Conversation for Doom2, replaces all of the 32 Maps

name: Phobos: Relive The Nightmare
description:
This is a nine-level WAD file with new graphics, music, and sound FX. The levels are very detailed, and are designed to mimic the "style" of the original shareware Doom.

This is an attempt at bringing back the "classic", realistic look of the Doom 1 levels. The story is the same as Doom 1 - Knee Deep in the Dead. You must fight your way through the Phobos moon base to the anomaly that monsters are pouring through. Check out the additional notes at the end of this file for more level info.

name: Good Morning Phobos
description: The Mapset is an updated version of the old game it replaces few soundtracks with different ones from popular megawads, also replaced 3 maps with another 3 new maps, the mapset has a mish mash between old school design and new school design visually, but it has something for everyone, fun and challangeing maps, no slaughterfest maps though..

name: Comatose
description:
Comatose is a single-map wad. Focusing on a gloomy atmosphere, players will explore a vast, ruined city full of invisible monsters.

The wad was a winner of 2016's Cacowards and placed 13th in Doomworld's 100 most memorable maps.

name: Gachaga Champ
description: Gachaga Champ is an arcade Bishi Bashi game released on 1999 exclusively in Japan. It was developed and published by Konami. Two joysticks to compete in a wide variety of challenges. Players can take the challenge solo or go head to head with another player. Over 40 fun and addictive mini-games, it’s a great fun for both children and adults!

name: Beat Saber
description: An arcade port of Beat Saber.

name: Dirt Track Racing Pinball
description: Dirt Track Racing Pinball is an arcade pinball game based on Dirt Track Racing series. Gameplay is similar to other Wildfire Studios pinball titles and features two tables based on Dirt Track Racing and Dirt Track Racing: Sprint Cars games

name: The Sudoku Challenge!
description: Play the Japanese numbers game that's driving everyone mad. We guarantee that once you've tried one Sudoku puzzle, you'll be hooked! The goal of Sudoku is deceptively simple, but it is a challenging game of logic and reasoning. The only requirements are brains and concentration. Try the number puzzle that has stormed its way into major newspapers, magazines, and websites across the United States, the United Kingdom and the world.

name: Taikyoku Renju
description: Taikyoku Renju is a Game Boy port of Renju. Despite not being released outside Japan, the game has an option to play completely in English.

name: My Forced Yakuza Fiancée
description: One day, you come to the aid of a distressed girl cornered by menacing criminals… However, little do you know, the stranger you saved is none other than Miyabi Kenzaki, the boss of a notorious yakuza clan!
